mapper.select: select a.id as id,a.status as status, a.name as name, a.original_language as original_language from annexe a left join atask_ann at_a on at_a.aid=a.id where a.discard='0' and at_a.atid=#{atid}

select c.type as type,SUM(c.count) as count from ( select type ,COUNT(*) as count from annexe where create_time>#{time} group by type UNION (SELECT 'txt', 0) UNION (SELECT 'pdf', 0) UNION (SELECT 'word', 0) UNION (SELECT 'eml', 0) ) c group by type order by type desc
